goal.en: Artificial intelligence (AI) is an intelligent system created by humans and simulates the decision-making mode of humans based on input information through learning algorithms. This course mainly introduces traditional machine learning and reinforcement learning. Basing the basics of mathematics, the course introduces the spirit, logic, and methods of AI algorithms and the required mathematical tools. Each topic will train students to write programs to implement algorithms with basic Python instructions, compare them with related Python and other packages (ex: Scikit-learn) or Matlab-related instructions, and finally discuss the industrial application cases of AI.
goal.ch: 人工智慧(AI)是由人工創造的智慧系統，是透過學習演算法模擬人類根據輸入資訊所進行的決策模式的機器。本課程主要介紹傳統機器學習與目前運用廣泛的強化學習。課程將從數學基礎開始，介紹目前各演算法的精神、邏輯、與推導方法，並介紹所需要的數學工具，亦即To know what, why, and how。課程中，每個主題將訓練學生以Python的基本指令自行撰寫程式實現演算法，然後與相關Python等套件(如:sklearn)或Matlab相關指令做比較，最後探討AI的產業應用案例。 本課程主要培養決策、統計、機器學習、程式撰寫、資訊技術等科學的整合能力，及製造系統與技術實作能力，包括： 1. 歸納人類的思考模式與決策方法然後以數學工具表達的能力 2. 將實務問題以數學表達並且提出解決對策的能力 3. 以Python程式語言實現演算法的邏輯以及數學運算的能力 4. 應用程式語言解決實務問題的能力 5. 簡報與書面報告的語言與文字論述的邏輯能力

content.en:
1. Introduction of Artificial Intelligence
2. Mathematics of Artificial Intelligence
3. PCA algorithm and its application
4. LDA algorithm and its application
5. SVM algorithm and its application
6. Decision tree algorithm and its application
7. K-Means algorithm and its application
8. Introduction of Reinforcement Learning (RL)
9. Markov decision process(MDP) algorithm and its application
10 . MDP optimal strategy algorithm: Value iteration & Q value iteration method
11. Partially observable Markov decision process (POMDP) algorithm and its application
12. Greedy POMDP algorithm and its application
13. RL algorithm: Q learning & Actor-critic methods
14. AI application in industrial
